name: Magnetic Elemental
movement: burrow 20 ft., fly 20 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: A large creature of elemental origin that harnesses magnetic powers to manipulate metal objects and hinder armored foes.
memorable: Its ability to control metal objects makes it a challenging opponent for those relying on metal armor and weapons.
goals: To dominate the battlefield by manipulating metallic foes and objects through its magnetic powers.
relations: Could be encountered with other elemental beings or constructs that utilize metal.
environment: Typically found in places with plenty of metal resources or as guardians in elemental rifts.
strengths: Advantage on attacks against metal armor wearers, damage immunities to lightning and poison.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma limit its tactical abilities and social maneuvering.
attacks: Two slam attacks that deal significant bludgeoning damage with good accuracy.
most_powerful_ability: Magnetic Pulse, which can either pull or push enemies and manipulate their equipment.
senses: Has tremorsense to detect movement within 30 feet, which helps in combat and avoiding ambushes.
additional_information: Damage resistances to nonmagical slashing, piercing, and bludgeoning.
Can grapple creatures wearing metal armor via its magnetic abilities.
Pulling small metal items closer and potentially sticking them to it.
Magnetic control makes it tricky for foes to attack with metal weapons.
Magnetism feature excludes gold and silver items.
test_queries: elemental that can pull and push metal items
